mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_survey_user( survey_user_id, survey_user_name, survey_user_sex, survey_user_age, phone_number, second_user_name, survey_user_address, create_time )VALUES ( #{surveyUserId}, #{surveyUserName}, #{surveyUserSex}, #{surveyUserAge}, #{phoneNumber}, #{secondUserName}, #{surveyUserAddress}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select organization_id as organizationId, organization_name as organizationName, organization_desc as organizationDesc, organization_phone as organizationPhone, organization_address as organizationAddress, create_time as createTime from t_organization where organization_id = #{organizationId}
select image_id as imageId, image_url as imageUrl, sort from t_organization_image where organization_id = #{organizationId};

SELECT user_name as userName, sex, age, phone_number as phoneNumber, password, parent_id as parentId, organization_name as organizationName, user_type as userType, user_source as userSource, user_status as userStatus from t_app_user where organization_id = #{organizationId}
